ValidationRule.description: Require Shared Storage Vendor field if Project Focus is equal to Server Consolidation
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Project_Focus__c , 'Server Consolidation' ) , ISPICKVAL( Shared_Storage_Vendor__c , '') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If Project Focus is Server Consolidation, then Shared Storage Vendor field must be specified.
